docs.abstract: More than 35,000 runners participate in the 2014 Boston Marathon, a year after three people were killed and more than 260 wounded when bombs exploded near the finish line; moment of silence is held at 2:49 for the victims and survivors of the 2013 attack.

headline.main: For Boston, a New Beginning After a Safe Ending to Its Marathon
